item.title: java_general fix (bug 32836)
item.description:
java_general fix by RB (fixes bug 32836)
:
Fix a memory leak when using xpath or using ResourceResolver and not hitting getElementByIdUsingDOM() Thanks to Sylvain Dusart.

item.title: java_general fix
item.description:
java_general fix by RB :
Fix erroneous creation/verification when using XPath2Filter and inclusive c14n.

item.title: java_general fix (bug 23554)
item.description:
java_general fix by RB (fixes bug 23554)
:
Library now throws an exception when asked to sign/verify an inexistent fragment. Thanks to Raymond Wong.

item.title: java_general fix
item.description:
java_general fix by RB :
Restore reset behaviour as default when reusing Canonicalizers(but an append one can still be used).

item.title: java_general fix (bug 33393)
item.description:
java_general fix by RB (fixes bug 33393)
:
Fix a bug when using base64transformation and external resources. Thanks to Sean Mullan.

item.title: java_general fix
item.description:
java_general fix by RB :
Fix a bug when passing XMLsignatureInput(InputStream) streams that don't acknowledge reset() as expected.

item.title: java_general fix (bug 32996)
item.description:
java_general fix by RB (fixes bug 32996)
:
Added i14n Base64 error message. Thanks to Sean Mullan.

item.title: external-libs remove
item.description:
external-libs remove by RB :
Clean unused jar (xmlParserAPI.jar,etc) and check and stored new versions.

item.title: external-libs update
item.description:
external-libs update by RB :
Generated the dist jar with version (i.e. xmlsec-1.2.1.jar instead of plain xmlsec.jar)

item.title: build remove
item.description:
build remove by RB :
Clean unused build*.xml files.
